info.description: This is a group of API for WTM Service
info.title: WTM Backend Service

get.description: List all banners with pagination and search functionality

parameters.description: Filter by active status of banners
parameters.name: is_active

post.description: Create a new banner with the specified details.
Update the order of a banner in the promotional banners.
Update the status of a banner (active/inactive).

get.description: Fetch details of a specific banner by its Id.

put.description: Update an existing banner with the specified details.

get.description: List bookings with pagination and filtering options

parameters.description: Search by booking code or guest name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve all items in the user's cart

post.description: Add an item to the user's cart

delete.description: Remove an item from the user's cart

post.description: Finalize the cart by submitting guest data and changing booking status to "in review"

get.description: List booking history with pagination and filtering options

parameters.description: Search by booking code or guest name
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Search by guest name or booking code
parameters.name: search_by

get.description: List booking logs with pagination and filtering options

parameters.description: Search by booking code or guest name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a list of payment statuses.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of payment statuses

post.description: Upload a receipt for a booking
Update the status of a booking

get.description: Retrieve a list of booking statuses.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of booking statuses

post.description: Send a contact us email

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of email logs using query parameters.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of email logs

get.description: Retrieve a list of email templates

parameters.description: Template Signature Text dalam html format
parameters.name: signature_text

get.description: Example payload JSON for additional room features

200.description: Payload additional room features in JSON format

get.description: Example payload JSON for nearby places

200.description: Payload nearby places in JSON format

get.description: Example payload for room options based on breakfast type

200.description: Payload room options with breakfast in JSON format

get.description: Example payload JSON for social medias

200.description: Payload social medias in JSON format

get.description: Retrieve a file from the specified bucket and object key.

post.description: Initiates the password reset process by sending a reset link to the user's email

200.description: Password reset link has been sent to your email

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of hotels using query parameters.

parameters.description: Search keyword to filter hotels by name
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Nearby places as JSON string. Example: /example_nearby_places
parameters.name: nearby_places

parameters.description: Social media links as JSON string. Example: /example_social_medias
parameters.name: social_medias

get.description: Retrieve a list of additional rooms with pagination.

parameters.description: Search keyword to filter additional rooms by name
parameters.name: search

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of additional rooms

get.description: Retrieve a list of hotels for a specific agent with pagination and filtering options.

parameters.description: Number of hotels to return per page (default: 10)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Search term to filter hotels by name or description
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Minimum price range for filtering hotels
parameters.name: range_price_min

parameters.description: Maximum price range for filtering hotels
parameters.name: range_price_max

parameters.description: Filter hotels by total number of rooms (e.g., 1,2,3,4,5)
parameters.name: total_rooms

parameters.description: Filter hotels by bed type Id (e.g., 1,2,3)
parameters.name: bed_type_id

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of hotels for agent

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific hotel for agents.
Retrieve a list of all bed types with pagination.

parameters.description: Search keyword to filter bed types by name
parameters.name: search

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of all bed types

get.description: Retrieve a list of facilities with pagination.

parameters.description: Search keyword to filter facilities by name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a list of provinces where hotels are located.
Retrieve a list of available rooms based on the provided filters.

parameters.description: Hotel Id to filter available rooms
parameters.name: hotel_id

parameters.description: Month to filter available rooms (format: YYYY-MM)
parameters.name: month

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of available rooms

get.description: Retrieve a list of room types for a specific hotel.

parameters.description: Hotel Id to filter room types
parameters.name: hotel_id

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of room types

post.description: Add a new room type to a hotel

parameters.description: Without breakfast details as JSON string. Example : /example_room_options?room_options=without_breakfast
parameters.name: without_breakfast

parameters.description: With breakfast details as JSON string. Example : /example_room_options?room_options=with_breakfast
parameters.name: with_breakfast

parameters.description: Additional room features as JSON string. Example: /example_additional_features
parameters.name: additional

put.description: Update the details of a room type by Id.

parameters.description: Price without breakfast as JSON string. Example: /example_room_options?room_options=without_breakfast
parameters.name: without_breakfast

parameters.description: Price with breakfast as JSON string. Example: /example_room_options?room_options=with_breakfast
parameters.name: with_breakfast

parameters.description: Additional amenities as JSON string. Example: /example_additional_features
parameters.name: additional

delete.description: Remove a room type by its Id.

put.description: Update the status of a hotel by Id.

parameters.description: Hotel status (true for approved, false for rejected)
parameters.name: status

get.description: Retrieve a list of hotel statuses.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of hotel statuses

get.description: Retrieve hotel details by Id.

parameters.description: Nearby places as JSON string. Example: /example_nearby_places
parameters.name: nearby_places

parameters.description: Social media links as JSON string. Example: /example_social_medias
parameters.name: social_medias

delete.description: Remove a hotel by its Id.

post.description: Logs in a user with username and password
Logs out the user by clearing the refresh token cookie

get.description: Get a list of notifications with pagination
Cek apakah server berjalan
Retrieve the profile information of the currently authenticated user based on the JWT token provided in the Authorization header.
Retrieve a paginated list of promo groups based on optional filters such as search keyword, page, and limit.

parameters.description: Search keyword to filter promo groups
parameters.name: search

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of promo groups

post.description: Create a new promo group by providing the group name in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of members belonging to a specific promo group using query parameters.
get.summary: Get members of a promo group

post.description: Assign one or more users to a promo group. This can be used to add new members or update existing users' promo group association.
post.summary: Assign users to a promo group

parameters.description: Payload to add member to promo group
parameters.name: request

200.description: Successfully assigned member to promo group

delete.description: Remove a user from a specific promo group by providing the required data in JSON format.
delete.summary: Remove a member from a promo group

parameters.description: Payload to remove member from promo group
parameters.name: request

200.description: Successfully removed member from promo group

post.description: Assign a promo to a specified promo group.

delete.description: Remove a promo from a specified promo group.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of promos that belong to a specific promo group using query parameters.
get.summary: Get detailed promos in a promo group

get.description: List promos that are not assigned to any promo group.

parameters.description: Promo Group ID to exclude promos already assigned to this group
parameters.name: promo_group_id

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific promo group by its ID.

delete.description: Remove a promo group by its ID.

parameters.description: Id of the promo group to be removed
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieve a list of promos with pagination.

parameters.description: Search keyword to filter promos by name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new promo with the specified details.

put.description: API to set the status of a promo (active/inactive)

parameters.description: IsActive to set (true for active, false for inactive)
parameters.name: is_active

get.description: Retrieve a list of promo types with pagination.

parameters.description: Search keyword to filter promo types by name
parameters.name: search

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of promo types

get.description: Retrieve a promo by its Id.

put.description: Update an existing promo with the specified details.

delete.description: Remove a member from a promo by Id.

get.description: Refreshes the user's access token using the refresh token stored in a cookie

post.description: Registers a new user with username, email, and etc.

get.description: Generate a report for agent bookings within a specified date range and filters

parameters.description: Start date for the report in YYYY-MM-DD format
parameters.name: date_from

parameters.description: End date for the report in YYYY-MM-DD format
parameters.name: date_to

200.description: Successfully generated report for agent bookings

get.description: Generate a detailed report for agent bookings with pagination

200.description: Successfully generated detailed report for agent bookings

get.description: Generate a summary report of bookings with optional filters

parameters.description: Start date for the report in YYYY-MM-DD format
parameters.name: date_from

parameters.description: End date for the report in YYYY-MM-DD format
parameters.name: date_to

get.description: Validates the password reset token

post.description: Resets the user's password using a valid reset token

get.description: Retrieve a list of available role access configurations.

put.description: Update the access permissions associated with a specific role by providing the updated configuration in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users using query parameters.

parameters.description: Role name to filter users (e.g. admin, agent, support, super_admin)
parameters.name: role

parameters.description: Id of the agent company to filter users
parameters.name: agent_company_id

put.description: Update a user with the provided details

post.description: Create a new user with the provided details

parameters.description: Promo Group ID (required if role is agent)
parameters.name: promo_group_id

parameters.description: Agent Company (required if role is agent)
parameters.name: agent_company

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of agent companies using query parameters.

parameters.description: Search keyword to filter agent companies
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users associated with a specific agent company using query parameters.

200.description: Successfully retrieved users by agent company

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of control users using query parameters.

post.description: Update the status of a user (active/inactive).
